00052 static void initData(ModifierData *md) 
00053 {
00054     SurfaceModifierData *surmd = (SurfaceModifierData*) md;
00055     
00056     surmd->bvhtree = NULL;
00057 }
00058 
00059 static void freeData(ModifierData *md)
00060 {
00061     SurfaceModifierData *surmd = (SurfaceModifierData*) md;
00062 
00063     if (surmd) {
00064         if (surmd->bvhtree) {
00065             free_bvhtree_from_mesh(surmd->bvhtree);
00066             MEM_freeN(surmd->bvhtree);
00067         }
00068 
00069         if (surmd->dm)
00070             surmd->dm->release(surmd->dm);
00071 
00072         if (surmd->x)
00073             MEM_freeN(surmd->x);
00074         
00075         if (surmd->v)
00076             MEM_freeN(surmd->v);
00077 
00078         surmd->bvhtree = NULL;
00079         surmd->dm = NULL;
00080     }
00081 }
00082 
00083 static int dependsOnTime(ModifierData *UNUSED(md))
00084 {
00085     return 1;
00086 }
00087 
00088 static void deformVerts(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00089                         DerivedMesh *derivedData,
00090                         float (*vertexCos)[3],
00091                         int UNUSED(numVerts),
00092                         int UNUSED(useRenderParams),
00093                         int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00094 {
00095     SurfaceModifierData *surmd = (SurfaceModifierData*) md;
00096     
00097     if (surmd->dm)
00098         surmd->dm->release(surmd->dm);
00099 
00100     /* if possible use/create DerivedMesh */
00101     if (derivedData) surmd->dm = CDDM_copy(derivedData);
00102     else surmd->dm = get_dm(ob, NULL, NULL, NULL, 0);
00103     
00104     if (!ob->pd) {
00105         printf("SurfaceModifier deformVerts: Should not happen!\n");
00106         return;
00107     }
00108 
00109     if (surmd->dm) {
00110         unsigned int numverts = 0, i = 0;
00111         int init = 0;
00112         float *vec;
00113         MVert *x, *v;
00114 
00115         CDDM_apply_vert_coords(surmd->dm, vertexCos);
00116         CDDM_calc_normals(surmd->dm);
00117         
00118         numverts = surmd->dm->getNumVerts ( surmd->dm );
00119 
00120         if (numverts != surmd->numverts || surmd->x == NULL || surmd->v == NULL || md->scene->r.cfra != surmd->cfra+1) {
00121             if (surmd->x) {
00122                 MEM_freeN(surmd->x);
00123                 surmd->x = NULL;
00124             }
00125             if (surmd->v) {
00126                 MEM_freeN(surmd->v);
00127                 surmd->v = NULL;
00128             }
00129 
00130             surmd->x = MEM_callocN(numverts * sizeof(MVert), "MVert");
00131             surmd->v = MEM_callocN(numverts * sizeof(MVert), "MVert");
00132 
00133             surmd->numverts = numverts;
00134 
00135             init = 1;
00136         }
00137 
00138         /* convert to global coordinates and calculate velocity */
00139         for (i = 0, x = surmd->x, v = surmd->v; i<numverts; i++, x++, v++) {
00140             vec = CDDM_get_vert(surmd->dm, i)->co;
00141             mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, vec);
00142 
00143             if (init)
00144                 v->co[0] = v->co[1] = v->co[2] = 0.0f;
00145             else
00146                 sub_v3_v3v3(v->co, vec, x->co);
00147             
00148             copy_v3_v3(x->co, vec);
00149         }
00150 
00151         surmd->cfra = md->scene->r.cfra;
00152 
00153         if (surmd->bvhtree)
00154             free_bvhtree_from_mesh(surmd->bvhtree);
00155         else
00156             surmd->bvhtree = MEM_callocN(sizeof(BVHTreeFromMesh), "BVHTreeFromMesh");
00157 
00158         if (surmd->dm->getNumTessFaces(surmd->dm))
00159             bvhtree_from_mesh_faces(surmd->bvhtree, surmd->dm, 0.0, 2, 6);
00160         else
00161             bvhtree_from_mesh_edges(surmd->bvhtree, surmd->dm, 0.0, 2, 6);
00162     }
00163 }

00167     /* name */              "Surface",
00168     /* structName */        "SurfaceModifierData",
00169     /* structSize */        sizeof(SurfaceModifierData),

00172                             | eModifierTypeFlag_NoUserAdd,
00173

00176     /* deformMatrices */    NULL,

00190     /* foreachTexLink */    NULL,
00191 };
